title: Growing up overnight
creator_contributor_role: FILEF - Italian Federation of Migrant Workers and their Families, co-ordinator
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Immigrants - Australia
abstract: A personal story of migrant experience by Joe Mazzeo.
description: Joe migrated in 1959 when he was 13 years old and became his family's main wage earner less than a year later when his father lost a leg. In this story Joe gives us a glimpse of his experience since then saying his life is now "enjoying every day which is filled with friends and family". Created as part of the Racconti: La Voce del Popolo Digital Storytelling in association with The Italian Federation of Migrant Workers and their Families (FILEF).
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006194; Racconti: La Voce del popolo = The Voice of the people; Active; 2003
